event_name: DeSci & ReFi Summit:  Road to Devcon
description:
​The DeSci & ReFi Summit is a Road to Devcon event bringing together innovators, researchers, and enthusiasts in the fields of Decentralized Science (DeSci) and Regenerative Finance (ReFi). This informal conference, organized by DeSci Thailand, showcases initiatives in Thailand, as well as researchers from Thai universities. We'll highlight projects that are either homegrown in Thailand, led by Thai founders, or have a significant impact within the country.

​Join us for a day filled with inspiring talks, panel discussions, and networking opportunities. Plus, enjoy delicious Thai food and enter lucky draws to win tickets for Devcon and crypto prizes!
